name: Triangle
description: In that game you will be given the triangle with 3 sides, also there will be three balls that you should hit. On the course of game the speed of balls will grow, and there will appear different traps on the map.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista Processor: Intel® Pentium® III or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 or later Processor: Intel® Pentium® IV or higher Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
